00021 namespace OgreOggSound
00022 {
00024 
00031         template <class Type>
00032         class LocklessQueue
00033         {
00034         private:
00036                 Type* m_buffer;
00037 
00039                 size_t m_head;
00040 
00042                 size_t m_tail;
00043 
00045                 size_t m_size;
00046 
00047         public:
00049                 inline LocklessQueue(size_t size) :
00050                 m_head(0), m_tail(0), m_size(size + 1)
00051                 {
00052                         m_buffer = new Type[m_size];
00053                 }
00054 
00056                 inline ~LocklessQueue()
00057                 {
00058                         delete [] m_buffer;
00059                 }
00060 
00062                 inline bool push(const Type& obj)
00063                 {
00064                         size_t next_head = (m_head + 1) % m_size;
00065                         if (next_head == m_tail) return false;
00066                         m_buffer[m_head] = obj;
00067                         m_head = next_head;
00068                         return true;
00069                 }
00070 
00072                 inline bool pop(Type& obj)
00073                 {
00074                         if (m_tail == m_head) return false;
00075                         obj = m_buffer[m_tail];
00076                         m_tail = (m_tail + 1) % m_size;
00077                         return true;
00078                 }
00079         };
00080 };
